thread.title: SOUND OFF WITH THE KOMETS - OCT. 19

title: SOUND OFF WITH THE KOMETS - OCT. 19
text:
SOUND OFF WITH THE KOMETS - OCT. 19 
By DONOVAN KLEIN - 21ALIVE October 19, 2015 Updated Oct 19, 2015 at 8:19 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, IND. (21ALIVE) - The Oct. 19 episode of Sound Off with the Komets is live from the SportONE/Parkview Fieldhouse with 21Alive's Tommy Schoegler and special guest and Komets legend, Bob Chase. 
The Komets are off to a hot start on the ice winning their first two games of the season against Kalamazoo. The guys take a look ahead as the Komets play on Friday and Saturday this week. 
He is the man, the myth, the legend: Bob Chase. The former Komets great talks all things Komets and share some of his most memorable moments of the past.
